short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parse class schedule and add events to Google Calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool automatically parses your class schedule from Cornell's Student Center and creates events in your Google Calendar. 

Key Features:
- Automatic Schedule Parsing: Extracts class names, days, times, and locations directly from your universityâ€™s scheduling system.
- Google Calendar Integration: Seamlessly adds events to your - - - Google Calendar, complete with recurrence rules and location details.
- Smart Event Management: Detects if an event already exists, preventing duplicate entries. If a class's time is "To Be Assigned," the extension alerts you without cluttering your calendar.
- Instant Feedback: Get real-time updates in the extension's popup window as your schedule is parsed and events are created.

Stay organized, stay on track, and take control of your academic schedule with the Google Calendar Class Scheduler.
